text: logon apane paravaradigaar se daro aur us din ka khauph rakho jab na koee baap apane bete ke kaam aaega aur na koee beta apane baap ke kuchh kaam aa sakega khuda ka (qayaamat ka) vaayada bilkul pakka hai to (kaheen) tum logon ko duniya kee (chand roza) zindagee dhokhe mein na daale aur na kaheen tumhen phareb dene vaala (shaitaan) kuchh fareb de
